name: Flow Like Water, Reach Like Air
effect:
Target Spirit gets Range-+2 with all Powers.
Target Spirit may Push 1 of their {presence} to an adjacent land, bringing up to 2 {explorer}, 2 {town} and 2 {dahan} along with it.

threshold.effectText: The moved {presence} may also bring along up to 2 {city} and up to 2 {blight}.
